title: Bug 125678 - The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
OB: The original chart instance in report design handle is not modified after running the report.
EB: I expect the chart to be bound with data after running the report.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Get the design time instance of chart in the application. 
2. Call the method to run the report. 
3. Verify that the chart is not modified and still shows the design time data, instead of being bound with the actual report data.
